### getClass() {#a1631d1b02497419b3e3d7ba5571f685b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const Record &#42; llvm::RecordKeeper::getClass (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name) const</>}
